00026 namespace Hypertable { namespace Config {

00028 void init_hyperspace_client_options() {
00029   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00030     ("hyperspace", str()->default_value("localhost:38040"),
00031         "hyperspace master server to connect to in <host:port> format")
00032     ("hyperspace-timeout", i32()->default_value(30000),
00033         "Timeout in milliseconds for hyperspace connection")
00034     ("keepalive", i32()->default_value(10000),
00035         "Interval in milliseconds of keepalive message from Hyperspace client")
00036     ("lease-interval", i32()->default_value(60000),
00037         "Hyperspace master lease interval in milliseconds")
00038     ("grace-period", i32()->default_value(60000),
00039         "Grace period in milliseconds before 'jeopardy' for hyperspace client")
00040     ;
00041   alias("hyperspace-timeout", "Hyperspace.Timeout");
00042   alias("keepalive", "Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval");
00043   alias("lease-interval", "Hyperspace.Lease.Interval");
00044   alias("grace-period", "Hyperspace.GracePeriod");
00045   // hidden aliases
00046   alias("hs-host", "Hyperspace.Master.Host");
00047   alias("hs-port", "Hyperspace.Master.Port");
00048 }
00049 
00050 void init_hyperspace_client() {
00051   Endpoint e = InetAddr::parse_endpoint(get_str("hyperspace"));
00052   bool isdefaulted = defaulted("hyperspace");
00053   properties->set("hs-host", e.host, isdefaulted);
00054   properties->set("hs-port", e.port, !e.port || isdefaulted);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void init_hyperspace_command_shell_options() {
00058   CommandShell::add_options(cmdline_desc());
00059 }
00060 
00061 void init_hyperspace_master_options() {
00062   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00063     ("port", i16()->default_value(38040),
00064         "Hyperspace master listening port")
00065     ("dir", str()->default_value("hyperspace"),
00066         "Hyperspace root directory name")
00067     ("keepalive", i32()->default_value(10000),
00068         "Interval in milliseconds of keepalive message from Hyperspace client")
00069     ("lease-interval", i32()->default_value(20000),
00070         "Hyperspace master lease interval in milliseconds")
00071     ;
00072   alias("reactors", "Hyperspace.Master.Reactors");
00073   alias("workers", "Hyperspace.Master.Workers");
00074   alias("port", "Hyperspace.Master.Port");
00075   alias("dir", "Hyperspace.Master.Dir");
00076   alias("keepalive", "Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval");
00077   alias("lease-interval", "Hyperspace.Lease.Interval");
00078 }
